org.tal.redstonechips.circuit.scan
Class ScanParameters

java.lang.Object
  org.tal.redstonechips.circuit.scan.ScanParameters

public class ScanParameters
extends Object

Used for passing arguments when scanning recursively for chips.

Author:
Tal Eisenberg
